stripped_text: False Flag can be advanced. When the Runner accesses False Flag, give the Runner 1 tag for every 2 advancement tokens on False Flag. click, 7 hosted advancement tokens: add False Flag to your score area as an agenda worth 3 agenda points.

title: False Flag
